Speech-generating devices (SGD) can be funded by Medicaid, Medicare, commercial insurance, and military insurance. From start to finish, we're here to help you through this process. Ready to get started? Log in or create an accountWe’ll walk you through the rest! Tell me about the Funding Process Learn about the basics of speech-generating device funding through your health insurance. Help! I don't know where to start Connect with your local consultant to learn about our devices, services, and support. It's go time!  Let's get started To apply for a trial or purchase of one of our devices, you'll need an account. Log in with your existing PRC-Saltillo account or create one. Don't fret about funding. We’re here to help. How To Obtain Funding Learn about the funding process, from trial device to getting your very own, and everything in between. Frequently Asked Questions Get answers to common questions regarding the funding process such as: I know what device I want, what next? Does my insurance cover speech generating devices? What forms do I need to complete? Insurance Tips As you begin the process of working with your insurance company to obtain a device, they'll have questions for you. We’ve compiled a list of codes, documents, and other items you’ll need before you make that first call – and after. Funding Glossary What’s an AOB? What does CMN stand for? Our list of commonly-used funding and insurance terms will help you “learn the jargon” as you work on funding your device. Deferrals & Denials A deferral or a denial from your insurance company is not the end of the road. Learn the difference between the two decisions and how PRC-Saltillo will continue to work on your behalf to try and get a favorable outcome. Blog Read about hot topics in Funding for AAC. Templates & Samples View or download sample AAC Evaluations for clients with a variety of diagnoses. In addition, examples of Addendums and Appeals are provided. Alternate Funding Sources Learn about Alternate Funding sources for AAC such as Easter Seals and CareCredit. We’ll help guide you through the process.
